channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-22565] Javadoc Warnings: @see cannot be used in inline documentation
item.description: mvn site gives Javadoc Warnings: @see cannot be used in inline documentation. Fix them.
item.summary: Javadoc Warnings: @see cannot be used in inline documentation

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
